summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Community Development; authorizing a contract with the Economic Development Council of Puget Sound to provide certain expert and consultant services in connection with a marketing study of the Central Area and the operation of the City's Methanol Project; increasing the expenditure allowance in Object of Expenditure "3000 Other Services & Charges" in Program Category "Office of the Director" (Code 1400) in the 1975 Budget of said Department, reallocating certain Federal Revenue Sharing funds, making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
